text:
Hi,
I am trying to reach Timeline events API, but I am working with hapiKey, so I dont know how I can reach the api requirements (userId, appId). Moreover, I dont get how to create an app, it looks like I am already inside one, but impossible tor each “My Apps” section
Hey <@UQH1HM89W> you may want to look at this article about how to create an app as a starting point <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/how-do-i-create-an-app-in-HubSpot>
that may seems stupid, but I am unable to reach Developer home. I get this as a home instead
ah ok, so you need to start by creating a developer account first. you can sign up for that here <http://developers.HubSpot.com|developers.HubSpot.com>
there are different types of accounts that do different things
the account you screenshot is a “normal” account where you can use Timeline Events, but you need to define them in a developer account
Makes sense ! I am now able to reach Developer home, now going to follow the steps. Thanks !
npx hs watch --mode=publish why is this removing the code i changed on site template?
I appreciate you feeding your work back into the community <https://github.com/MadKudu/node-HubSpot/pull/223>
My pleasure, your developer tools looks pretty interesting so far !
